meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>burial</kanji>, so the verb version would be <vocabulary>to bury</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to inter</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: We're going <vocabulary>to bury</vocabulary> you, so this is your new <reading>home</reading> (ほうむ) now, friend.
